article_title: Why The Top 2 Percent Pay Lots of Tax

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: The White House released Barack Obama’s 2014 tax return last week. It showed that the President and First Lady paid $93,362 in federal taxes on a total income of $477,383—an effective tax rate of 19.6 percent. But those are only the top-line numbers—their return contains lots of interesting information that shows how [...]
